title: Fed hikes interest rate, Americans brace for recession, with Ben White
description: The Federal Reserve's Wednesday decision to raise interest rates by 0.75 percentage point — the second hike this summer — marks another historic move in the central bank's effort to avoid a deep recession in America. Ben White, Politico's chief economic correspondent, joins Chuck to analyze Washington's continued moves to avoid a national economic meltdown.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
